entry.title: Introducing My New Logo!
entry.summary: Hi! I am super happy to show you something I have made.
entry.content:
Hi! I am super happy to show you something I have made.

My old logo was just plain and simple. Nothing wrong with it, I think just plain text got a little boring. I mean, here. Look at this.

Does it not look boring? So, I have made a new one! Have a look.

I find it much better than just some text. While, yes, I am using the same font, I have changed it up a bit. I have updated my website to fit these changes, even the icon in the tab has change! I am happy with this change, but hey, I like it. You may hate it, I don't care if you do. I am keeping it like this for a while, so... sorry if you hate it.

entry.title: I am Learning Python and Node.JS!
entry.summary: I am learning Python, and am going to learn how to use Node.JS using a couple of tutorials on YouTube. Specifically the "Node.js A to Z" by James Murphy and the "Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners" by freeCodeCamp.org. But until I complete them, you…
entry.content:
I am learning Python, and am going to learn how to use Node.JS using a couple of tutorials on YouTube. Specifically the "Node.js A to Z" by James Murphy and the "Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners" by freeCodeCamp.org. But until I complete them, you are just going to have to live with my VB.NET software, sorry.

But with python I can make neat little applications. Don't judge me for the code below, as I am just learning the language.

user_age = input("Enter your age: ")
user_name = input("Enter your name: ")
print("Hi, " + user_name + "! You are " + user_age + "-years-old")

This currently is my most basic understanding of Python.

So, yeah, I'm working on it.

entry.title: TheCrafters001 Direct has ended
entry.summary: So, I am sorry to say this, but after long consideration, I have decided to kill off TheCrafters001 Direct
entry.content:
So, I am sorry to say this, but after long consideration, I have decided to kill off TheCrafters001 Direct

The reason being is that I never really updated it. But hey, I am going to look on the bright side, I am learning Python, and am going to learn how to use Node.JS using a couple of tutorials on YouTube. Specifically the "Node.js A to Z" by James Murphy and the "Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners" by freeCodeCamp.org. But until I complete them, you are just going to have to live with my VB.NET software, sorry.

entry.title: Support Email Fully Functional.
entry.summary: Hi! My support emails have been setup properly, and are now fully functional! To view them you can go to the Contact Me page and scroll down to Email Support!
entry.content: Hi! My support emails have been setup properly, and are now fully functional! To view them you can go to the Contact Me page and scroll down to Email Support!

entry.title: New Project: EasyInno.
entry.summary: EasyInno is a simple IDE that allows you to make Inno Setup Scripts with ease! More about the project will be revealed as the project is being worked on.
entry.content: EasyInno is a simple IDE that allows you to make Inno Setup Scripts with ease! More about the project will be revealed as the project is being worked on.

entry.title: The Adventure of Block reset
entry.summary: I have decided to reset the "The Adventure of Block" project.
entry.content:
I have decided to reset the "The Adventure of Block" project.

Reason

The reason why I have decided to do this, is because I am not very good at makeing assets for RPG Maker MV. I will use a lot of the default RPG Maker MV envirement sprites, but I will use some of my custom assets.

Sorry.

However, the current demo is still avaliable to play.

You can play it on the Games page.

entry.title: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!
entry.summary: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!
entry.content: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!1.3.0.1 is the last version of Flash Player 2. There will be no more updates.

entry.title: Flash Player 2 - 1.3.0.1 - Minor Updates
entry.summary: The changes include:Fixed a bug where you get an error for trying to run the Media PlayerFixed a help file link
entry.content:
The changes include:

  • Fixed a bug where you get an error for trying to run the Media Player
  • Fixed a help file link
